Package translator

The base of the translator; contains all the high-level constructs of the Java language.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ItemVisibility A set way of determining the visibility of something in java.
Nameable A standard way of accessing name information across various classes.
Typed When something contains a type, this just provides a nice interface for getting that type.
 

Class Summary
ActivatableVisitor Create a visitor structure that only processes classes on demand.
FieldDec A purely intermediary class designed to separate fields from their declarations for their respective class/method.
JavaClass  
JavaField  
JavaFile A representation of a java file.
JavaMethod A representation of a java method.
JavaMethodSignature Wraps the method signature for a method.
JavaPackages Provides a nice interface to Translator.
JavaScope Handles anything that can have its own scope, from a File to a Block.
JavaStatic Contains some instances of objects that are used all over the place and that make no sense to pass around.
JavaType The current setup for expressions requires this class.
JavaType.Object A class that represents classes.
JavaType.Primitive A class that represents primitives and their "inheritance".
JavaVisibleScope Handles anything that can haz a visibility modifier on it.
Translator The public interface to our Java to C++ translator.
 

Enum Summary
Visibility The possible visibility types out there.
 

Package translator Description

The base of the translator; contains all the high-level constructs of the Java language.
